chart.name: Missing DNS Responses
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_dns_queries_total').mean(over='1m').sum()
B = data('hubble_dns_responses_total').mean(over='1m').sum()
C = (A - B).publish(label='Queries without responses')

chart.name: Missing TCP SYN-ACKs
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_tcp_flags_total', filter=filter('flag', 'SYN')).mean(over='1m').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('hubble_tcp_flags_total', filter=filter('flag', 'SYN-ACK')).mean(over='1m').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).publish(label='Unanswered SYN packets')

chart.name: Missing ICMP Echo Replys
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_icmp_total', filter=filter('type', 'EchoRequest')).mean(over='1m').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('hubble_icmp_total', filter=filter('type', 'EchoReply')).mean(over='1m').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).publish(label='Unanswered ICMP Echo Requests')

chart.name: Incoming Request Success Rate (non-5xx responses)
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_http_requests_total', filter=not filter('status', '5*')).mean(over='1m').sum()
B = data('hubble_http_requests_total').mean(over='1m').sum()
(A/B).scale(100).publish(label='Success Rate')

chart.name: Incoming Requests by Source & Response Code
Incoming Request Success Rate (non-5xx responses) By Source
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_http_requests_total', filter=not filter('status', '5*')).mean(over='1m').sum(by=['source_namespace','source_workload'])
B = data('hubble_http_requests_total').mean(over='1m').sum(by=['source_namespace', 'source_workload'])
(A/B).scale(100).publish(label='Success Rate')

chart.name: HTTP Request Duration by Source (P50, P95, P99)
chart.programText:
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=50, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','source_namespace','source_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P50 by Source')
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=95, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','source_namespace','source_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P95 by Source')
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=99, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','source_namespace','source_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P99 by Source')

chart.name: Incoming Requests by Destination and Response Code
Incoming Request Success Rate (non-5xx responses) By Destination
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_http_requests_total', filter=not filter('status', '5*')).mean(over='1m').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','destination_namespace', 'destination_workload'])
B = data('hubble_http_requests_total').mean(over='1m').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name', 'destination_namespace', 'destination_workload'])
(A/B).scale(100).publish(label='Success Rate by Destination')

chart.name: HTTP Request Duration by Destination (P50, P95, P99)
chart.programText:
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=50, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','destination_namespace','destination_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P50 by Source')
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=95, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','destination_namespace','destination_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P95 by Source')
data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket').histogram_percentile(pct=99, bucket_name='le').sum(by=['k8s.cluster.name','destination_namespace','destination_workload','le']).scale(1000).publish(label='P99 by Source')


#data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds').percentile(50, by=['cluster', 'destination_namespace','destination_workload']).publish(label='P50 by Destination')
#data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds').percentile(95, by=['cluster', 'destination_namespace','destination_workload']).publish(label='P95 by Destination')
#data('hubble_http_request_duration_seconds').percentile(99, by=['cluster', 'destination_namespace','destination_workload']).publish(label='P99 by Destination')

chart.name: Flows processed per node
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_flows_processed_total', rollup='rate').max().publish(label='A')
B = data('hubble_flows_processed_total', rollup='rate').min().publish(label='B')
C = data('hubble_flows_processed_total', rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: Missing TCPv4 SYN-ACKs
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_tcp_flags_total', filter=filter('family', 'IPv4') and filter('flag','SYN')).mean(over='1m').sum(by='pod')
B = data('hubble_tcp_flags_total', filter=filter('family', 'IPv4') and filter('flag','SYN-ACK')).mean(over='1m').sum(by='pod')
(A - B).publish(label='Unanswered SYN packets by pod')

chart.name: Missing ICMPv4 Echo-Reply

publishLabelOptions.displayName: Unanswered ICMP Echo Requests by pod
publishLabelOptions.label: Unanswered ICMP Echo Requests by pod

chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_icmp_total', filter=filter('family', 'IPv4') and filter('type',
  'EchoRequest')).mean(over='1m').sum(by='pod')
B = data('hubble_icmp_total', filter=filter('family', 'IPv4') and filter('type',
  'EchoReply')).mean(over='1m').sum(by='pod')
(A - B).publish(label='Unanswered ICMP Echo Requests by pod')

chart.name: Missing DNS Responses
chart.programText:
A = data('hubble_dns_queries_total', rollup='rate').sum(by=['qtypes']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('hubble_dns_responses_total', rollup='rate').sum(by=['qtypes']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Pods with DNS Errors
chart.programText: A = data('hubble_dns_responses_total', filter=(not filter('rcode', 'No Error'))).top(by=['k8s.pod.name'], count=10).publish(label='A')
